monsters.name: Rahadin

traits.name: Deathly Choir
traits.desc: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.desc: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

spells: Rahadin's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Parriwimple has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Parriwimple hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Parriwimple makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Parriwimple adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Parriwimple must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ismark makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Zombie Plague Spreader
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

traits.name: Viral Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the plague spreader must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is poisoned and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this plague spreader's Viral Aura for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The plague spreader makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Virulent Miasma (1/Day)
actions.desc: The plague spreader releases toxic gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises as a zombie (see its stat block in the Monster Manual) 1 minute later. The zombie acts immediately after the plague spreader in the initiative count.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Ireena adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Ireena must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
